extendedInfo.description: "Get ready for the most exciting free offroad rush this year!!!" Badayer Racing EDITOR PICKED BY APPEGGS.COMAds FREE (No more annoying ads ruining your racing experience)BEST OFFROAD CAR & BUGGY RACING ON HANDHELD Just when you thought there can't be any awesome off-road racing game, we bring you BADAYER RACING!!! Drive your own custom made cars.AS TOUGH AS THEY GET Play the toughest off-road racing game on your device, where boost is your only friend. Bring your mad skills to the game and get beaten before you learn how to beat the game. The name of the game is Boost Boost Boost!!!GO FROM ZERO TO PRO The only game that won't give up but gets tougher as you get better. Easy wont be easy anymore!!! Race against other AI drivers and speed away in different tracks.CAREER Work your way on a career mode against tough opponents to become a pro. Win championship, unlock cars, while acting as an undercover agent and helping a champion racer in a story. MULTIPLAYER Play against your real friends online and show them who is the boss. Challenge them to fast and furious driving events. Real rally speed experience away from asphalt. CUSTOMISATION Mod your motor ride to your style and your own dream number plates. Nitro and turbo charged cars. LICENSED RACER Become a licensed racer and earn double the cash rewards. But be careful, too many fines can revoke your license. Taking driving tests in a realistic simulated environment.UNIVERSAL Create a profile and play it on iPhone or iPad or Android devices with your progress synced across devices. Very popular feature and must have nowadays.LEADERBOARD See where you stand in player ranking worldwide. SHARE Show off your in-game swag at anytime of the game by a simple click of a button. LOCALIZATION Play the game in different languages, English and Arabic, more to come. FREE RACING GAMECompletely Free and also it is Ads Free.***************************************************** For more information or support please visit http://www.aqdargames.com Thank you from Badayer Racing Team.*****************************************************

reviews.title: Very very poor
reviews.comment: Crashing after menu...not even game screen visible requires more ram plz reduce that.220 mb gone in vain un installed
reviews.author: M Kumar

reviews.title: Poor frame rate S3
reviews.comment: Nice game, good graphics, good physics. Lots of upgradable cars. Buts it\'s all let down by unplayable frame rate when other cars are on the screen. Fix that and it\'s a five star.
reviews.author: Rob T

reviews.title: Eljan
reviews.comment: The coolest racing I\'ve ever played its like 3d glasses awsome
reviews.author: Eliel Embuestro

reviews.title: Galaxy Note 2
reviews.comment: ........1st thing.... goto setting... controls.... steering wheel and push it all the way to the right ... 100%.....otherwise you CANT control it as a new player...
reviews.author: Rone Smith

reviews.title: Nice game
reviews.comment: The game control is good, it maybe a bit hard for starters. So the AI needs to be a bit easier for easy level within the arcade mode. i.e needs some sort of difficulty balancing.  In my opinion, the game graphics and art can be better.
reviews.author: Samahu San

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: This is the world best game ever
reviews.author: Arooj Irshad

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: The menu interface is clunky but the racing and controls are good. Shame no one plays the multiplayer.
reviews.author: Sean Dunbeck

reviews.title: LUND KE NICHE AANDD
reviews.comment: Chutiya ye game dow load mat kar apni gaand ke baal saaf kar. Firangi saale gaand bhi nahi dhote. Inki gaand me lund pura ke so javo  .. firangio ne   bhi to india walo ko 200-300 saal chooda h.   Bhai. Khabhi gandhi ki li.. kabhi laxmi bai ki li,  kabhi nehru ki faadi., kabhi kisi or ki to ab firangio ki or unki maa bahno ki gaand faado kisi bhi desh se ho .. Airport pe hi hamla bol do...
reviews.author: Wasim Akram

reviews.comment: Steering is far to hard for gameplay and uncontrollable. Has potential but not worth downloading
